name: Gonkulator
details:
Ring modThe Gonkulator offers independent gain, distortion, output, frequency, and ring controls. It features true bypass circuitry, an updated PSU jack, and a vintage-style aluminum chassis. True bypass allows your tone to remain pristine even when the Gonkulator is off. The 9 VDC power supply input makes the pedal more pedalboard friendly.
Based on the cult favorite DOD Gonkulator circuit design with updated components
Adjustable Carrier Signal
True bypass
9V alkaline dry battery or optional power supply
Crisp blue status LED
Lighter aluminum chassis
Specifications
Dimensions: 4.68” x 2.63”x 2.25”
Weight: 0.62 lb. (0.281 kg.)
